item.title: Info2 WS2018 Schedule
item.description: Tentative Schedule - Lab Topics are subject to change! Lab Assignments not linked here have not been released for this term yet and might be changed. Week KW Lecture Lecture Topic Lab Lab Topic 1 39 Fri, 2018-10-05 I Welcome Back, Overview, Designing Applications 1 Designing an Application, CRC Cards (Pre-Lab!) II Toolbox: Java, Eclipse File I/O. 2 40 Fri, 2018-10-12 I Error Handling and Exceptions reviewed 2 Implementing CRC cards (Pre-Lab!
